A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Fantastic movie but not without its flaws. The depth of character that Rian Johnson gives to everyone in this film of great. The visuals are great and the storyline itself isn't perfect but it's good.
I can understand some of the dislike with the plot and the Finn storyline but all in all a good movie.

We got a lot of epic scenes and story to dissect as fans.
